I am just back from Chicago. I thought those that were not in attendance might like to see some of the items i had there.  So  I just listed several tsuba and misc.  items on eBay, please feel, Please take a look if you wish. They are listed at starting bids lower than my prices at the show. Feel free to comment on them if it is educational. A friend helped me "kantei" tsuba
some to assign to schools but they could be mislabeled. Any comments are
fine (good bad or ugly).
